# Credential Merkle Disclosure Proof

This package get idea from [merkle-disclosure-proof-2021](https://github.com/transmute-industries/merkle-disclosure-proof-2021) and implement to be a plugin for [Veramo](https://veramo.io/). It follows the proposal [Credential Merkle Disclosure Proof](https://w3c-ccg.github.io/Merkle-Disclosure-2021) to generate a Merkle proof from a credential.

## Usage

### Setup

- Declare the plugin in your Veramo agent:

```yaml
   # Merkle Disclosure Proof credentialPlugin
    credentialIssuerMDP:
        $require: '@vckit/credential-merkle-disclosure-proof#CredentialMerkleDisclosureProof'
        $args:
            - suites:
                # - $require: '@veramo/credential-ld#VeramoJsonWebSignature2020'
                - $require: '@vckit/credential-merkle-disclosure-proof#VCKitMerkleDisclosureProof2021'
            contextMaps:
                # The LdDefaultContext is a "catch-all" for now.
                - $require: '@veramo/credential-ld?t=object#LdDefaultContexts'
                - $require: '@transmute/credentials-context?t=object#contexts'
                - $require: '@transmute/did-context?t=object#contexts'
                #  others should be included here
```

- Add the plugin to your Veramo agent:

```yaml
    agent:
        $require: '@veramo/core#Agent'
        $args:
            - schemaValidation: false
            plugins:
                # ... other plugins
                - $ref: /credentialIssuerMDP
```

### Issue a credential

The merkle disclosure proof plugin includes into the credential router plugin. So you can issue a credential through the credential router plugin with the proofFormat `MerkleDisclosureProof2021`. The issuer must be a did:web.

```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3332/agent/routeCreationVerifiableCredential" \
 -H "accept: application/json; charset=utf-8"\
 -H "content-type: application/json" \
 -d '{"credential":{"issuanceDate":"2023-12-25T08:40:25.243Z","@context":["https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/v1","https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/v1","https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/examples/v1","https://vckit-contexts.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/dev-render-method-context.json"],"type":["VerifiableCredential","VerifiableCredential","UniversityDegreeCredential"],"credentialSubject":{"id":"did:example:ebfeb1f712ebc6f1c276e12ec21","name":"Jane Smith","degree":{"type":"BachelorDegree","name":"Bachelor of Science and Arts","degreeSchool":"Example University"}},"render":[{"template":"<div style=\"width:300px; height:100px; border: 2px solid black; text-align:center\">\n  <div>\n    This {{credentialSubject.degree.name}} is conferred to\n  </div>\n  <strong style=\"font-size: 16px\">\n    {{credentialSubject.name}}\n  </strong>\n  <div>\n    by {{credentialSubject.degree.degreeSchool}}.\n  </div>\n</div>","@type":"WebRenderingTemplate2022"}],"issuer":{"id":"did:web:agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com"}},"proofFormat":"MerkleDisclosureProof2021","save":true,"fetchRemoteContexts":true}' \

```

### Redact a credential

To redact a credential, you need to provide the credential that was issued with the proofFormat `MerkleDisclosureProof2021` and the credential that you want to redact.

```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3332/agent/redactVerifiableCredential" \
 -H "accept: application/json; charset=utf-8"\
 -H "content-type: application/json" \
 -d '{"inputVerifiableCredential":{"issuanceDate":"2023-12-25T08:41:12.129Z","@context":["https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/v1","https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/examples/v1","https://vckit-contexts.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/dev-render-method-context.json","https://w3id.org/vc-revocation-list-2020/v1"],"type":["VerifiableCredential","UniversityDegreeCredential"],"credentialSubject":{"id":"did:example:ebfeb1f712ebc6f1c276e12ec21","name":"Jane Smith","degree":{"type":"BachelorDegree","name":"Bachelor of Science and Arts","degreeSchool":"Example University"}},"render":[{"template":"<div style=\"width:300px; height:100px; border: 2px solid black; text-align:center\">\n  <div>\n    This {{credentialSubject.degree.name}} is conferred to\n  </div>\n  <strong style=\"font-size: 16px\">\n    {{credentialSubject.name}}\n  </strong>\n  <div>\n    by {{credentialSubject.degree.degreeSchool}}.\n  </div>\n</div>","@type":"WebRenderingTemplate2022"}],"issuer":{"id":"did:web:agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com"},"credentialStatus":{"id":"http://localhost:3332/credentials/status/revocation-list-2020/did_web_agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/11","type":"RevocationList2020Status","revocationListIndex":6,"revocationListCredential":"http://localhost:3332/credentials/status/revocation-list-2020/did_web_agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/11"},"proof":{"type":"MerkleDisclosureProof2021","created":"2023-12-25T08:41:12.695Z","verificationMethod":"did:web:agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com#e9bc8c0d327897fc70f6d9dea05d1e103b7eca429deba83fc34c2cfde0e81c8f-key-0","proofPurpose":"assertionMethod","normalization":"jsonPointer","proofs":"","jws":"eyJhbGciOiJFZERTQSIsImI2NCI6ZmFsc2UsImNyaXQiOlsiYjY0Il19.InR4ZmZIVkpNZVJtdUlrWlNHVlZJZG9vUlpUUHJIVXYyanYydkRyeG1ZT009Ig.Sqr1Kt4UcjBCQjtF32Em2gbwOWAj3SAA0grUpVaDwM5zePjvr8euoJAjhVv9AnxwzyBPjZ47kn4Kdiui5iTvAw"}},"outputCredential":{"issuanceDate":"2023-12-25T08:41:12.129Z","@context":["https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/v1","https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/examples/v1","https://vckit-contexts.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/dev-render-method-context.json","https://w3id.org/vc-revocation-list-2020/v1"],"type":["VerifiableCredential","UniversityDegreeCredential"],"credentialSubject":{"id":"did:example:ebfeb1f712ebc6f1c276e12ec21","name":"Jane Smith","degree":{"type":"BachelorDegree","name":"Bachelor of Science and Arts"}},"render":[{"template":"<div style=\"width:300px; height:100px; border: 2px solid black; text-align:center\">\n  <div>\n    This {{credentialSubject.degree.name}} is conferred to\n  </div>\n  <strong style=\"font-size: 16px\">\n    {{credentialSubject.name}}\n  </strong>\n  <div>\n    by {{credentialSubject.degree.degreeSchool}}.\n  </div>\n</div>","@type":"WebRenderingTemplate2022"}],"issuer":{"id":"did:web:agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com"},"credentialStatus":{"id":"http://localhost:3332/credentials/status/revocation-list-2020/did_web_agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/11","type":"RevocationList2020Status","revocationListIndex":6,"revocationListCredential":"http://localhost:3332/credentials/status/revocation-list-2020/did_web_agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/11"}}}' \

```

```typescript
// inputVerifiableCredential is the credential that was issued with the proofFormat `MerkleDisclosureProof2021`
    {
    "issuanceDate": "2023-12-25T08:41:12.129Z",
    "@context": [
      "https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/v1",
      "https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/examples/v1",
      "https://vckit-contexts.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/dev-render-method-context.json",
      "https://w3id.org/vc-revocation-list-2020/v1"
    ],
    "type": [
      "VerifiableCredential",
      "UniversityDegreeCredential"
    ],
    "credentialSubject": {
      "id": "did:example:ebfeb1f712ebc6f1c276e12ec21",
      "name": "Jane Smith",
      "degree": {
        "type": "BachelorDegree",
        "name": "Bachelor of Science and Arts",
        "degreeSchool": "Example University"
      }
    },
    "render": [
      {
        "template": "<div style=\"width:300px; height:100px; border: 2px solid black; text-align:center\">\n  <div>\n    This {{credentialSubject.degree.name}} is conferred to\n  </div>\n  <strong style=\"font-size: 16px\">\n    {{credentialSubject.name}}\n  </strong>\n  <div>\n    by {{credentialSubject.degree.degreeSchool}}.\n  </div>\n</div>",
        "@type": "WebRenderingTemplate2022"
      }
    ],
    "issuer": {
      "id": "did:web:agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com"
    },
    "credentialStatus": {
      "id": "http://localhost:3332/credentials/status/revocation-list-2020/did_web_agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/11",
      "type": "RevocationList2020Status",
      "revocationListIndex": 6,
      "revocationListCredential": "http://localhost:3332/credentials/status/revocation-list-2020/did_web_agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/11"
    },
    "proof": {
      "type": "MerkleDisclosureProof2021",
      "created": "2023-12-25T08:41:12.695Z",
      "verificationMethod": "did:web:agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com#e9bc8c0d327897fc70f6d9dea05d1e103b7eca429deba83fc34c2cfde0e81c8f-key-0",
      "proofPurpose": "assertionMethod",
      "normalization": "jsonPointer",
      "proofs": "",
      "jws": "eyJhbGciOiJFZERTQSIsImI2NCI6ZmFsc2UsImNyaXQiOlsiYjY0Il19.InR4ZmZIVkpNZVJtdUlrWlNHVlZJZG9vUlpUUHJIVXYyanYydkRyeG1ZT009Ig.Sqr1Kt4UcjBCQjtF32Em2gbwOWAj3SAA0grUpVaDwM5zePjvr8euoJAjhVv9AnxwzyBPjZ47kn4Kdiui5iTvAw"
    }
  }

// outputCredential is that credential but it is redact the degreeSchool field and remove the proof
{
    "issuanceDate": "2023-12-25T08:41:12.129Z",
    "@context": [
      "https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/v1",
      "https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/examples/v1",
      "https://vckit-contexts.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/dev-render-method-context.json",
      "https://w3id.org/vc-revocation-list-2020/v1"
    ],
    "type": [
      "VerifiableCredential",
      "UniversityDegreeCredential"
    ],
    "credentialSubject": {
      "id": "did:example:ebfeb1f712ebc6f1c276e12ec21",
      "name": "Jane Smith",
      "degree": {
        "type": "BachelorDegree",
        "name": "Bachelor of Science and Arts"
      }
    },
    "render": [
      {
        "template": "<div style=\"width:300px; height:100px; border: 2px solid black; text-align:center\">\n  <div>\n    This {{credentialSubject.degree.name}} is conferred to\n  </div>\n  <strong style=\"font-size: 16px\">\n    {{credentialSubject.name}}\n  </strong>\n  <div>\n    by {{credentialSubject.degree.degreeSchool}}.\n  </div>\n</div>",
        "@type": "WebRenderingTemplate2022"
      }
    ],
    "issuer": {
      "id": "did:web:agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com"
    },
    "credentialStatus": {
      "id": "http://localhost:3332/credentials/status/revocation-list-2020/did_web_agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/11",
      "type": "RevocationList2020Status",
      "revocationListIndex": 6,
      "revocationListCredential": "http://localhost:3332/credentials/status/revocation-list-2020/did_web_agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/11"
    }
  }
```

### Verify a credential

The merkle disclosure proof plugin includes into the credential router plugin. So you can verify a credential through the credential router.

```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3332/agent/routeVerificationCredential" \
 -H "accept: application/json; charset=utf-8"\
 -H "content-type: application/json" \
 -d '{"credential":{"issuanceDate":"2023-12-25T08:41:12.129Z","@context":["https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/v1","https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/examples/v1","https://vckit-contexts.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/dev-render-method-context.json","https://w3id.org/vc-revocation-list-2020/v1"],"type":["VerifiableCredential","UniversityDegreeCredential"],"credentialSubject":{"id":"did:example:ebfeb1f712ebc6f1c276e12ec21","name":"Jane Smith","degree":{"type":"BachelorDegree","name":"Bachelor of Science and Arts"}},"render":[{"template":"<div style=\"width:300px; height:100px; border: 2px solid black; text-align:center\">\n  <div>\n    This {{credentialSubject.degree.name}} is conferred to\n  </div>\n  <strong style=\"font-size: 16px\">\n    {{credentialSubject.name}}\n  </strong>\n  <div>\n    by {{credentialSubject.degree.degreeSchool}}.\n  </div>\n</div>","@type":"WebRenderingTemplate2022"}],"issuer":{"id":"did:web:agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com"},"credentialStatus":{"id":"http://localhost:3332/credentials/status/revocation-list-2020/did_web_agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/11","type":"RevocationList2020Status","revocationListIndex":6,"revocationListCredential":"http://localhost:3332/credentials/status/revocation-list-2020/did_web_agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/11"},"proof":{"type":"MerkleDisclosureProof2021","created":"2023-12-25T08:41:12.695Z","verificationMethod":"did:web:agtrace-passports.s3.ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com#e9bc8c0d327897fc70f6d9dea05d1e103b7eca429deba83fc34c2cfde0e81c8f-key-0","proofPurpose":"assertionMethod","normalization":"jsonPointer","proofs":"","jws":"eyJhbGciOiJFZERTQSIsImI2NCI6ZmFsc2UsImNyaXQiOlsiYjY0Il19.InR4ZmZIVkpNZVJtdUlrWlNHVlZJZG9vUlpUUHJIVXYyanYydkRyeG1ZT009Ig.Sqr1Kt4UcjBCQjtF32Em2gbwOWAj3SAA0grUpVaDwM5zePjvr8euoJAjhVv9AnxwzyBPjZ47kn4Kdiui5iTvAw"}},"fetchRemoteContexts":true,"policies":{"credentialStatus":true}}' \
```
